dataset.title: Movements of blue sharks in the North Atlantic Ocean using satellite telemetry, 2014-2017

contact.organizationName: School of Aquatic and Fisheries Sciences University of Washington
Applied Physics Laboratory, University of Washington

dataset.abstract: This dataset contains Argos-based position estimates that represent the movements of a pelagic predator, the blue shark (Prionace glauca), in the Gulf Stream region and broader North Atlantic Ocean using electronic tags. We collected >2,000 tracking days recorded by 15 instrumented individuals over a three year period. Each individual shark was assigned a unique identification number that includes Taxononomic Serial Number (TSN) from Integrated Taxonomic Information System, tagging year and satellite tag Platform Terminal Transmission (PTT) number as "TSN_YR_PTT". We include one data file (.csv) per individual, a metadata table that provides additional information on size, sex and other metrics, and a metadata table that indicates the date range for data that was manually removed prior to archiving: 160424_2013_132346pnas_atn.csv 160424_2014_141195pnas_atn.csv 160424_2015_141261pnas_atn.csv 160424_2015_141264pnas_atn.csv 160424_2015_141268pnas_atn.csv 160424_2015_141270pnas_atn.csv 160424_2016_106744pnas_atn.csv 160424_2016_106745pnas_atn.csv 160424_2016_106746pnas_atn.csv 160424_2016_106747pnas_atn.csv 160424_2016_106748pnas_atn.csv 160424_2016_141262pnas_atn.csv 160424_2016_141263pnas_atn.csv 160424_2016_141265pnas_atn.csv 160424_2016_141266pnas_atn.csv 160424_2016_165927pnas_atn.csv 160424_2016_165928pnas_atn.csv Braun_atn_tag_deployment_metadata.csv cut_dates_atn.csv
dataset.purpose: This dataset was collected to test the influence of mesoscale eddies on a model pelagic predator.

keywordSet.keyword: blue shark, requin bleu, tibur√≥n azul
EARTH SCIENCE > AGRICULTURE > ANIMAL SCIENCE > ANIMAL ECOLOGY AND BEHAVIOR

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: Western North Atlantic, including one individual that moved into the Caribbean.

metadata.citation: Camrin Braun, Peter Gaube, Tane Sinclair-Taylor, Gregory Skomal, and Simon Thorrold. 2019. Movements of blue sharks in the North Atlantic Ocean using satellite telemetry, 2014-2017. Research Workspace. 10.24431/rw1k329, version: 10.24431_rw1k329_2019624213839.
